targets.expr: sum by (pod, xstore_name) (mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", polardbx_role="gms", namespace="$namespace", xstore_role="leader"})
sum by (pod, xstore_name) (mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", polardbx_role="dn", namespace="$namespace", xstore_role="leader"})

sum(polardbx_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})

sum(polardbx_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)
